899:2: siddhaṃ prasiddhaṃ vijitāmaraṃ ca śāntaṃ virāgaṃ suviśuddhaśīlam |
899:3: viśveśvaraṃ sarvaguṇākaraṃ vai śrīśākyasiṃhaṃ praṇamāmi nityam || 1 ||
899:5: nīlotpalābhaṃ nayanaṃ viśālaṃ śrīśākyasiṃhaṃ praṇamāmi nityam || 2 ||
899:13: śauddhodaniṃ lokavidaṃ munīndraṃ śrīśākyasiṃhaṃ praṇamāmi nityam || 6 ||
899:16: traiduḥkhaduḥkhād bhayavedilokān trāṇaṃ ca nītuṃ varabodhimātraiḥ |
899:17: jihvā ca mattehi sucakṣu sarvaṃ śrīśākyasiṃhaṃ praṇamāmi nityam || 8 ||
